name: Goblin Adventure (GoblinAdventure)
description:
Goblin Adventure is a mobile 3D Adventure-Platformer inspired by many classic platformer games. In this game, you play as a young green goblin who tries to save the goblin clan from extinction.  

Currently, there's only one level, but there will be many future level updates in near future.

Goblin Adventure is still at the alpha stage many bugs are expected. I hope you guys can enjoy the game at its current state and give me some constructive feedback so I can improve the game in futures update. We'll have a lot of new content & mechanic, please wait for it.

Also, this is my first game.

Warning: This game didn't support low-end mobile phone. I recommend having at least Snapdragon 778G to play this game.
